definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Di4 zhi4 Da4 xue2
Zhong1 guo2 Di4 zhi4 Diao4 cha2 ju2
Mei3 guo2 Di4 zhi4 Diao4 cha2 ju2

sentences.english: Large scaled geosciences software systems often use several dozens of types of data.
sentences.chinese: 大型的地質行業軟件系統使用到多達幾十種數據類型。

sentences.english: Slug test is a new method to obtain aquifer parameters.
sentences.chinese: 重錘試驗是一種獲得含水層水文地質參數的新方法。

sentences.english: The geology effect of 3-D seismic exploration in HK area, Jianghan region is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹江漢HK地區三維地震勘探的地質效果。

sentences.english: Reservoir bank collapse is an import geological problem which should have an effect on Three Gorges Reservoir Project.
sentences.chinese: 水庫塌岸是影響三峽水庫工程成敗的重大地質問題。

sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是淺埋岩溶區常見的一種地質災害。

sentences.english: This paper presents suggestions establishing a stable geological team.
sentences.chinese: 提出建立一支穩定的地質找礦隊伍等參考性建議。

sentences.english: Loess landslide is the most catastrophic geohazard in the northwest area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黃土滑坡是西北地區最爲嚴重的地質災害。

sentences.english: Niujuanhu oilfield is located in Santanhu basin, with complicated geology conditions.
sentences.chinese: 地處三塘湖盆地的牛圈湖油田，地質條件比較複雜。

sentences.english: Different geological environment conditions to different extent and in different ways affect the road engineering.
sentences.chinese: 不同地質環境條件對道路工程影響的程度和方式不同。

sentences.english: Both the two deposit systems have fine geological conditions with developed reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 兩種沉積體系均有儲層發育的良好地質條件。

sentences.english: The role and effectiveness of applying geo - radar in environmental engineering field has been summed up.
sentences.chinese: 總結了地質雷達在環境工程領域的作用。

sentences.english: When we investigate soils and divide them, We must pay a great attention to the geological factors in depth.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，在土壤調查與區劃時，必須重視深部地質因素。

sentences.english: A intelligence system for the analysis of river and sea physiognomy is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了河海地質地貌的智能分析系統。

sentences.english: They are typical geological remains from the Glacial Age.
sentences.chinese: 是典型的冰川期地質遺蹟。

sentences.english: The appeal of geological traces is limited as a tourism resource.
sentences.chinese: 地質遺蹟作爲旅遊資源，其吸引力有一定的侷限性。

sentences.english: China is among the countries that have most serious geological disasters .
sentences.chinese: 中國是世界上地質災害最嚴重的國家之一。

definition: strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
fault (geology)/CL:道[dao4],個|个[ge4]/(fig.) gap/rupture (in the transmission of some skill)/(tomography) cross-sectional
Shennongjialin, directly administered forestry reserve in east Hubei
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
